text: William Gregory SteubeFlorida Bar Member Profile, William Gregory Steube ( ; born May 19, 1978) is an American attorney and politician. He is the U.S. representative for since 2019. He is a member of the Republican Party. Steube served three terms in the Florida House of Representatives from 2010 until 2016. He was a member of the Florida Senate from 2016 until 2018. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Florida Category:Lawyers from Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Florida Legislature
title: Greg Steube
